title: [Large-Scale] Vocational Training Institution Language Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic language education and practical knowledge in specialized professional fields
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based learning environment with limited PC access, operating a flexible assessment system centered on formative evaluation

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five stages of the ISD model to design a language curriculum.
Learners can systematically analyze language learning problems reflecting professional practice contexts.
Learners can develop three or more types of formative assessment tools executable in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
